title: Drawing, "Design for a Wall Mounted", March 26, 1962
inscribed: Signed and dated in graphite at lower right corner: E. HOYT 3/26/62 Inscribed in graphite across upper left: SUGGESTED REVERSIBLE BOARD CONFIGURATIONS/NOTE: LIGHT AND SCREEN COMBINATION NOT SHOWN/ON THIS DRAWING.; at lower right: NOTE:/THE CHALKTRAY MAY BE USED/TO HOLD A PAPERBOARD/PRESENTATION IN ANY/OF THE ABOVE CONFIGURATIONS.; at center left: CORKBOARD SURFACE.; at center right: ALTERNATING CORKBOARD/AND CHALKBOARD SURFACE.; at lower left: CHALKBOARD SURFACE.; at lower right: MOTION PICTURE SCREEN IN DOWN POSITION.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Wall Mounted", March 26, 1962.
March 26, 1962. graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1599.
